page.title: 10SOUTHHOUSE FARM BY MATTHEW G
page.content: MR. SCOT_SANDY HAS LIVED AT SOUTHHOUSE FARM FOR 17 YEARS AND RENTS 74 ACRES OF COUNTY COUNCIL LAND.HE HAS 17 ACRES OF SUGAR BEET,SOWN ON APRIL 21ST, THAT WILL BE HARVESTED AROUND NOVEMBER.HE HOPES TO GET ABOUT 20 TONS PER ACRE WHICH WILL BE SENT TO A SUGAR FACTORY IN IPSWICH.THERE ARE 6 ACRES OF POTATOES WHICH ARE SOLD TO LOCAL SHOPS AND 6 ACRES OF PEAS WHICH GO FOR ANIMAL FOOD. THERE ARE 18 ACRES OF BARLEY WHICH ARE SOLD TO A MALTINGS IN WITHAM TO BE USED IN BEER MAKING. HE GROWS 27 ACRES OF WHEAT WHICH IS SOLD TO A FLOUR MILL.WE SAW 51 SUSSEX RHODE CHICKS ;THEY WERE 3 WEEKS OLD . THEIR FIRST EGGS WILL BE LAID IN ABOUT 6 MONTHS. THEY WILL BE KEPT IN A SHED IN DEEP LITTER AND SHOULD LAY ABOUT 40 EGGS A DAY.
